Navigate to 'https://www.example.com/products/item-101'
Verify the main product image has source 'product-101-main.jpg', rendered dimensions 600x400px, natural dimensions 1200x800px, and alt text 'Luxury Watch, Silver'
Verify the product title 'Elite Chronograph' displays with font size 28px, font weight 700, color #1a1a1a, and is left aligned
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is visible, has background color #007bff, text 'Add to Cart', and border radius 4px
Verify the price text '249.99 USD' has font size 22px and color rgb(50,50,50)
Verify the product description text uses font family 'Arial' with padding 15px
Verify the item count dropdown shows '1' as its initial value
Navigate to 'https://www.example.com/login'
Verify the 'Username' input field has placeholder 'Enter your username', border 1px solid #ccc, and is enabled
Verify the 'Password' input has opacity 1, width 300px, and height 40px
Verify the 'Log In' button has background color #28a745, text 'Log In', and color #ffffff
Verify the 'Forgot Password?' link is visible, has font size 14px, and color #007bff
Verify the form's overall width is 400px, is centered horizontally, and has 50px top margin
Verify the 'Home' link in the primary navigation bar is active, has background color #e9ecef, font weight 600, and padding 10px 15px
Verify the 'About Us' link has color #007bff and font size 16px
Verify the search input field is visible, has border radius 20px, and placeholder 'Search...'
Verify the entire navigation bar has height 60px, is positioned at top 0, left 0, right 0, and has background color #ffffff
Play the video on 'https://www.example.com/video/lecture-01'
Verify the video player controls are visible, the video is not muted, and is not in fullscreen mode
Verify the play button has aria-label 'Play video' and width 50px
Verify the volume slider has value 75%
Verify the video viewport has natural dimensions 1920x1080px and rendered dimensions 800x450px
Verify a watermark 'ExampleEdu' is present in the bottom right corner at x 750px and y 420px
Verify the main carousel image has source 'carousel-item-1.jpg' and is loaded within 500ms
Verify the next button has background color #333, color #fff, and border radius 50%
Verify the carousel container has width 900px and height 500px
Verify the transition duration for sliding images is 800ms
Verify 5 pagination dots are visible at the bottom center of the carousel, each 10px wide and 10px high
Navigate to 'https://www.example.com/profile/jane_doe'
Verify the profile picture has source 'jane_doe.jpg', rendered dimensions 100x100px, and a circular shape with border radius 50%
Verify the username 'Jane Doe' has font size 24px, font weight 700, and color #333333
Verify the 'Edit Profile' button is enabled, has background color #007bff, and text 'Edit Profile'
Verify the user's email 'jane.doe@example.com' is displayed with padding 5px and font family 'Roboto'
Verify the orders table has 10 rows
Verify the 'Order ID' column header has font weight 600 and text align 'center'
Verify the first order's 'Status' cell displays 'Processing' with color #ffc107
Verify the table has border 1px solid #dee2e6
Verify each row has height 40px
Verify the table is left aligned with margin top 20px
Verify the 'Total' column values are all right aligned and have font size 15px
Click 'Open Modal'
Verify the modal dialog becomes visible, centered on screen at x 50% and y 50%, with background color rgba(0,0,0,0.5) for the overlay
Verify the modal's content area has width 500px, height 300px, and border radius 8px
Verify the 'Close' button inside the modal has aria-label 'Close dialog' and color #6c757d
Verify the modal's title 'Confirmation' has font size 20px and font family 'Verdana'
Expand the first accordion item labeled 'What is your return policy?'
Verify the content panel becomes visible, transitioning over 300ms, and its height expands from 0px to 150px
Verify the text inside the panel has font size 15px and color #555555
Verify the header 'What is your return policy?' has background color #f8f9fa and font weight 500
Verify the padding of the content panel is 20px on all sides and it is active
Scroll down to y coordinate 800px
Verify the 'Scroll to Top' button becomes visible at bottom 20px and right 20px, with opacity 1
Verify the button has width 50px, height 50px, and background color #007bff
Click the 'Scroll to Top' button
Verify the page scrolls to top 0 within 500ms
Verify the button has alt text 'Back to top'
Verify its border radius is 50% for a circular shape and its color is #ffffff
Click the 'Options' dropdown
Verify the dropdown menu becomes visible, positioned directly below the button, with width 200px
Verify the dropdown menu contains 4 items
Verify the 'Settings' option is visible and has font size 16px
Verify the 'Profile' option has background color #f8f9fa when hovered, and its text color is #333333
Verify the entire menu has border 1px solid #ced4da and 5px padding
Verify the 'Logout' item is the last one in the list
Type 'appl' into the search input field
Verify a suggestion list becomes visible immediately below the input, with a width matching the input's 350px
Verify the list contains 3 suggestions
Verify the first suggestion 'Apple iPhone' has text color #212529 and font weight 400
Verify the input field remains focused, has border 2px solid #007bff, and padding 10px
Verify the suggestion list uses font family 'Segoe UI' and has background color #ffffff
Verify a 'Success' toast notification appears at top 20px and right 20px, has background color #28a745, color #ffffff, and text 'Form submitted successfully!'
Verify the toast notification fades out with an animation taking 2s to reach opacity 0
Verify the toast has border radius 5px and width 300px
Verify the notification remains visible for 3s before starting its fade out and its font size is 16px
Initiate data loading
Verify a loading spinner is visible, centered vertically and horizontally at x 50% and y 50% of the viewport
Verify the spinner has animation duration 1s and rotates infinitely
Verify its color is #007bff and it has width 50px and height 50px
Verify the spinner's opacity is 1
Verify the area behind the spinner has a dimmed background color rgba(255,255,255,0.7) when active
Submit a form with invalid data
Verify an error message 'Please correct the highlighted fields.' appears with color #dc3545, font size 14px, and font weight 500
Verify the error message's top margin is 10px and left padding is 5px
Verify the message has background color #f8d7da and border 1px solid #f5c6cb
Verify the message remains visible until new input is provided and its width is 90% of the parent container
Scroll down the page
Verify the header element, initially at top 0, remains sticky at top 0 when scroll position > 100px
Verify the sticky header's background color is #ffffff and its border bottom is 1px solid #e0e0e0
Verify its height is 70px
Verify the header contains text 'My Application' with font size 24px and font family 'Roboto'
Verify its padding-left is 20px and it has opacity 1
Click on the date input field
Verify the calendar dropdown appears directly below it
Verify the input's placeholder is 'Select a date' and its value is '2023-10-26'
Verify the currently selected date in the calendar is 26th October 2023
Verify the input field has width 200px and border radius 4px
Verify the input field has aria-label 'Appointment Date' and border 1px solid #ced4da
Verify the first image thumbnail source is 'thumb_01.jpg', rendered dimensions 150x100px, and alt text 'Scenic landscape'
Verify the thumbnail has border 2px solid #cccccc when not selected
Verify the thumbnail has border 2px solid #007bff when selected
Verify its padding is 5px
Verify the image is loaded within 300ms
Verify its natural dimensions are 600x400px and its background color is #f0f0f0
Verify the 'Share' button group is visible at right 20px and bottom 100px
Verify it contains 4 share icons, each 32x32px
Verify the 'Facebook' icon has background color #3b5998 and aria-label 'Share on Facebook'
Verify all icons have border radius 50%
Verify the group has margin top 10px and is vertically aligned
Verify the 'Twitter' icon's source is 'twitter_icon.svg' and its opacity is 0.9
Verify the footer section is visible at the bottom of the page, full width at 100%
Verify it contains 'About Us', 'Contact', and 'Privacy Policy' links
Verify the 'Contact' link has color #ffffff, font size 14px, and is left aligned
Verify the footer has background color #343a40 and padding 20px
Verify each link has opacity 0.8 when not hovered
Verify each link has opacity 1 when focused
Verify its font family is 'Open Sans' and font weight 400
